caption: Alberto was amazing!! Shared the history of Paris at every stop in a very entertaining way. We learned so much and really enjoyed every minute of the tour. Highly recommend, specially with Alberto as your guide üòä ‚Ä¶

Alberto was best guide ever. Early and easy to spot with his green umbrella. He had interesting stories and facts. Will definetly advise to take the tour on your first day as it gives a very good overview of the city.

Alberto's tour was absolutely brilliant. He provided a wealth of detailed information and humourous historic stories to keep you engaged throughout. A very memorable experience and would recommend without reservation.

We had an unforgettable experience on our Paris tour with Albert! From the moment we met, his energy and humor made the tour feel more like a fun adventure than a history lesson. Albert shared fascinating stories behind iconic landmarks, weaving in historical events with a personal touch that made everything come alive. His knowledge was extensive, and he kept the group engaged with witty anecdotes and fun facts. Highly recommend him for anyone wanting a unique and entertaining view of Paris!

Alberto was an amazing tourguide and was able to guide us through the centre of paris. He made the tour engaging through his extensive knowledge with some nice sprinkles of knowledge. Highly recommend Alberto!
Great tour with Alberto. We saw all the main sights of Paris with a great history of Paris and the key sights. If you‚Äôre in Paris don‚Äôt miss this tour.

Wonderful experience! I thought Alberto was a great story teller and was able to engage the audience well. I‚Äôve been on a lot of free walking tours in many other cities and this one is the really more interesting ones. I highly recommend it.
We had the best history lesson today with Alberto! He was energized, spoke so eloquently and kept us engaged. The best!!
Such an amazing way to get to know Paris! We did the tour with Alberto and he was amazing - point out all the interesting stories and facts about Paris!
It was the best tour in paris to learn the history and it covers all the special  monuments. Alberto our guide was superb.

Albarto was on time.. he was welcoming and attentive to all inquiries.. he introduced himself and managed to maintain a good spirit among the participants.. he is well informed about t the history of France and the famous attractions.. interstates an facts.. he is truly passionate about what he does.. I had great time.. than you Alberto

Very knowledgeable with the places we walked and knows a great amount of history that he shared with us. Very friendly and accommodating to everyone esp. with my mother on her wheelchair. The walking tour was very interactive and he had good command of his communication skills in English.Thank you very much, Alberto.
We had an amazing tour with Alberto. He provided some great historical facts about France in a fun and approaching way, we enjoyed it very much. I would highly recommend this tour.

Alberto gave an engaging tour through the city center of Paris. We learned history of important monuments and buildings in France including the oldest bridge, Notre Dame, the Louvre, the Eiffel tower and more!

Alberto was a great guide! The tour was very entertaining and helpful. I particularly liked the overview of French history, which was presented in such a way that I was finally able to memorize it. But there was also no shortage of curious fun facts. I would definitely recommend it.

We had an amazing tour led by Alberto on Saturday! The tour covers all the essential sights in the city and is perfect for a first impression of this beautiful city or even if you've visited before! Our guide provided many much appreciated facts about french history and culture - Alberto was a great storyteller and shared many interesting stories which we won't forget! The tour is very scenic and totally worth it, highly recommend it!

Did the tour with Alberto who was a very informative guide. The route was easy to walk and the wealth of information that we received about French history was truly remarkable. If you want to see the major sites while learning about the city, definitely take this tour. Perfect for solo travelers as well as you won‚Äôt miss out on the photo opportunities.
Had a great tour at Paris with Alberto. He‚Äôs extremely knowledgeable and friendly. Rich experience with so interesting stories over the most important sites to visit in Paris.
Had a wonderful walking tour with Alberto. He was fantastic and shared tons of details about the historic places where we stopped at a solid pace make sure everybody was taken care of.
So interesting! A great way to get oriented to Paris!!!! Guide Alberto was so great to listen to, open to all questions, very easy to hear and follow!
Alberto is such a great tour guide, it was fun and I got to learn a los of french history
Not only I learnt 2000 years of France history and Paris, I learnt from one of the best story tellers alive - Alberto, the tour guide. Can't recommend more. 10 stars out of 5.
Alberto, you‚Äôre the Best! What a GREAT walking tour. Recommend Alberto and his tour(s) anytime you are in Paris. Thank you Alberto!

We did the walking tour with Alberto, and we couldn‚Äôt have been happier that we got him as our tour guide. He is very knowledgeable about the history of Paris and a very entertaining guide. Highly recommend this tour if you are looking for an introduction to the city.

Alberto gave an absolutely amazing tour of the center of Paris! The time flew by and he was the perfect mix of entertaining and educational. Highly recommend for everyone to get a great overview of Paris' history!

Alberto is a superb guide! The tour was really insightful, Alberto draws you in with his intriguing stories (ps. He has great comedic timing as well). Definitely left the session feeling much more knowledgeable about France.
Beautiful tour, filled with mindblowing historical facts, stunning views and a good insight into the city center.

Alberto is beyond awesome and one of the best tour guides I‚Äôve had toe fortune to meet. He has a talent for storytelling, connecting with people and making otherwise boring history very intriguing. 10000/10 would recommend.

Definitely one of the best ways to see Paris. It‚Äôs amazing how much you miss without the guidance of someone who knows the city intimately. Alberto was a wonderful guide - he was knowledgeable, enthusiastic, and had a wicked sense of humour. We‚Äôre already looking for our next walking tour!

Alberto was amazing. Incredibly informative as he shared the history of Paris. He kept our attention through the entire 2.5 hour walk. I gave him 50 euro for my wife and I and, in hindsight, should have given him more. He is that good!

Alberto was our tour guide for the city centre in Paris. Smart, knowledgeable and witty he made our tour exceptionally memorable. An exceptional storyteller and well versed in the history of Paris - would highly recommend his tours!

My friend and I did a historic Paris trip with Stellar Tours and our guide was Alberto. The tour was both informative and entertaining at the same time. We had so much fun learning about the city and it's history. I highly recommend it for everyone and I'm certainly doing this tour again with others.
Alberto with Stellar walking Tours did an excellent job with Paris tour. Highly recommend. Knows his stuff.

Alberto was by far the best tour guide. Informative, captivating, fun! My 13 year old stayed engaged and we all learned so much. This is a must do when visiting Paris. Highly recommend it‚Äôs the first thing you do when arriving.

Alberto was an excellent and knowledgeable guide who gave a thorough description of each attraction along with a brilliant and humorous history that went as far back as the Gaelic Parisii. Whole tour lasts about 2 hours 30 minutes and we walked around 3 miles covering some significant aspects of the city. It was the first thing we did (straight off the plane) and it set us up nicely for the rest of the trip. Absolutely worth your time and couldn't have asked for anything more.

Awesome tour! Super informative. Alberto (the guide) has plenty of information about the different sites, explained in a fun and engaging way. He's also super knowledgable about Paris in general and had plenty of tips on which other sites to explore. The 3 hrs flew by!

Alberto was a fantastic guide! Gave us a nice comprehensive 2 hour tour of the must see places in Paris city center, talks and explains everything with a smile and great stories. Highly recommended! 10/10 üèÜ ‚Ä¶

Our guide, Alberto was excellent and went above and beyond while explaining the history of the city. His explanation of the city, its history and story made the trip more memorable for us as we could understand and appreciate the city better.
